channel.title: Can i use any client with my server?
channel.description: Hey, my server has the old dclaws, the 1 glitched with a sad emote, so now,..im looking for a client with the new dclaws gfx and emote, and i found a few, but when i try to use them to log on my server, i got black screen + dc really fast, why? and help please :(
